website_summaries.verdict: If you need extra size, this model provides the same reliable and nearly indestructible product you expect from Victorinox with more space.
pros: 8 wheels on double casters help it move smoothly and easily
cons: This bag weighs a lot even before you pack it, which will cut down on what you can put in the bag before exceeding weight limits

customer_reviews.title: Completely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This case has seen 30+ flights in the several months that I have had it and I am completely satisfied. It is surprisingly spacious, I have done several 3 week trips with just this suitcase and a bookbag. It fits perfectly in the overhead compartment, never any trouble from TSA. The charging port on the outside is pretty slick and useful. Overall, this is a great piece of luggage and was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality but way over priced.
customer_reviews.text: Just like another reviewer - I feel it's over priced only for the brand name. For this price, I'd rather get a Tumi or Briggs that actually have the look and feel worth the price rather than this one which is good quality but way over priced. Also, not sure about the black but the titanium was not that great.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Victorinox Lexicon Hardside Medium
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably light weight & appears will stand up to typical airline handling for years to come. Packing options include a zippered divider for one side with useful zippered pockets. The other side has a less than elastic strap that won't hold much of anything with any weight in place. Overall it's the best luggage I've had. As for value per dollar it seems about 1/3 more expensive than than it ought to be.
customer_reviews.author: Dana K. Brune

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect in overhead bin and love the wheels turning in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very functional, sleek, holds more than you think. Works perfect in overhead bin and love the wheels turning in all directions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage
customer_reviews.text: Fantastically well built luggage. I look forward to many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Horvath Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Space crunch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of luggage with no space for more than a day’s worth of clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Anshul

customer_reviews.title: High tech features and built to last.
customer_reviews.text: Light and seems very durable. It's a big bag, and won't fit in an overhead. It may actually qualify as "oversized." But with all that interior volume, you could pack for multiple people and only check the one bag. Rolls very easily too. Also has a TSA approved lock that allows your bag to remain secure and still be inspected, and if you register the combination you can easily recover it. Also, the bag has a bag tracker that allows it to be recovered and returned to you. All these features don't come cheap; the suitcase is $600, but it appears that it will last for a fair amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ballister

customer_reviews.title: Big & beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to see how very large this suitcase is. I could pack for two weeks easily! It glides across floors, whether carpeted, wood, or linoleum, and it pulls nicely across roads & sidewalks. The interior is designed well to keep my clothes smooth with secure spaces for toiletries and the many books I like to pack. I have had the occasional breakage in the contents of my soft-sided rolling suitcase; it appears that this hard-sided case will provide better protection.
customer_reviews.author: J. Howard

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that the zippers cradle into the locking ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible quality, hard-shell carry-on suitcase made with Swiss quality. I love the fact that the zippers cradle into the locking mechanism and the caster wheels are as smooth as butter!! I used to have a fabric carry-on but like the fact that a hard-shell is going to better keep my travel items in a safer state when moving. The handle for transporting this luggage is as smooth as the wheels and the shiny color is impeccable. ***** HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.author: Dan McKinnon

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, versatile suitcase
customer_reviews.text: One thing I can say, this is a sturdy suitcase. It's hard plastic, lightweight, and rolls like a dream. Inside there are multiple zippered pockets of various sizes, even a USB cable. One half of the case is zippered off, handy for keeping dirty clothing or toiletries separate. If you travel frequently, such a versatile, strong suitcase would be worth the money. It's small, and will slip into the overhead with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: lguidarini

customer_reviews.title: Great, smooth-rolling
customer_reviews.text: This is a really comfortable bag to travel with. The exterior is a soft, flexible plastic (don't expect a rigid hardshell) but not so soft as to give any concern over durability. The charging extension is a nice feature; I have a battery that I can put inside the bag, and so it becomes very convenient to charge your phone off of the jack on the outside of the bag. Without question, the highlight is the double-four wheel system though. It rolls really, really well. Either direction. Long-wise or flat-wise. And straight-up. This is just so helpful when traveling and finding yourself in tight, cramped quarters--which seems to happen all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Saccenti

customer_reviews.title: A Winner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of luggage. It is lightweight but sturdy. Good pockets. 360 degree wheels. Perfect for short trips where you don't want to check bag.
customer_reviews.author: Duffer.

customer_reviews.title: Huuuge.
customer_reviews.text: Monster luggage, so big my 7 yo can fit inside. It's lightweight well made. I have Europe trip coming up and it will be great for that. The wheels are smooth and lots of inside compartments help with organizing. Universal lock it's nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Bigslacker

customer_reviews.title: Just So-So
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool bag. I love that I can zip my clothing and suit into separate sections inside the bag. It rolls incredibly easy as well (which is nice). It does not, however, hold up so well. My bedroom wall scratched the outside hard enough to pull paint and put a big groove in it. My wall! Imagine what being tossed into and out of a cargo hold will do to it.
customer_reviews.author: C. A Scovel

customer_reviews.title: Great smallish carryon
customer_reviews.text: Great case, a little smaller than a standard carryon. This is very well made and even has a usb cable running from the back of the carryone to an inside pocket where you can store a backup battery. Pretty cool idea. This is my second Victorinox carryon and I have not been let down
customer_reviews.author: B.K.

product_meta.title: Victorinox Lexicon Hardside Expandable Spinner Luggage, Black, Checked-Extra Large (31")
product_meta.description: Size:Checked-Extra Large (31")| Color:BlackBreak-resistant 100% virgin polycarbonate with stylish, scratch-resistant matte finish delivers superior strength for the highest level of performance. Comfort grip, one-touch, dual-trolley aluminum handle system locks into three different positions - 104 cm (41"), 99 cm (39") and 94 cm (37") - to accommodate travelers of various heights. Large 60mm dual-caster wheels provide a smooth roll across any surface while offering 360 Degree maneuverability, and are super-recessed to maximize case size and packing capacity. Hidden ID tray in handle bezel slides up to reveal pen and SIM card replacement tool. Top and side soft-grip retractable haul handles are super-recessed to maximize case size and packing capacity. Double racquet coil YKK zippers are puncture-resistant. On the interior, two zippered mesh pockets ideal for accessories maximize available packing space between trolley poles. X-shaped compression straps cover a greater surface area to keep folded items secure. Zippered divider wall stretches for easy packing and features a large zippered pocket with easy-to-clean lining ideal for wet or dirty clothes. Removable full suiter can be used with or without case and features foam bolsters to reduce wrinkles. Integrated Travel Sentry Approved combination lock allows TSA screeners to open the lock without destroying it, and relock it after inspection. Access Lock Combination Recovery Program allows you to register your lock combination on victorinox.com and recover it if it is ever forgotten. Swiss Tracker Bag Tracking Program will reunite you with your bag anywhere in the world should it ever be lost - for free. Capacity: 4655 cu in / 73 l. Weight: 10.1 lbs. / 4.58 kg.
feature_bullets: Break-resistant 100% virgin polycarbonate with stylish, scratch-resistant matte
Large 60mm dual-caster wheels provide a smooth roll across any surface
Integrated USB cable connects exterior USB port to zippered interior hanging side pocket where a power pack (not included) can be stored

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars65 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
